Description: Hi  I had a runny nose took some immune booster and med lemon and now it is a cough with sporadic phlegm. Should get test for this COVID 19?   I don’t have a fever. I also have a bit of short breath.
DialogueText:
Patient:
Hi  I had a runny nose took some immune booster and med lemon and now it is a cough with sporadic phlegm. Should get test for this COVID 19?   I don’t have a fever. I also have a bit of short breath.
Doctor:
In brief:   Test if can    don't go to a public space, consult via the telephone or get a coronavirus test   Would you like to video or text chat with me?
